documentation.title: RangeValidator Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: php grid, php ajax grid, php datagrid, php gridview, ajax grid php

property.name: ErrorMessage
property.shortdesc: Get or set the message shown when user input is not valid.
property.longdesc: Get or set the message shown when user input is not valid.
property.samplecode:
<?php				
	$col = new GridBoundColumn();
	$validator = new RangeValidator();
	$validator->MinValue = 10;
	$validator->MaxValue = 100;
	$validator->ErrorMessage = "Not in range!";
	$col->AddValidator($validator);
	$grid->MasterTable->AddColumn($col);
?>
